paraList.paragraph: Team DAVE is FRC Team 3683 â€“ the FIRST Robotics Team at St. David CSS in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada.

The 2025 year is the 15th season of Team DAVE. This season, we competed at the Niagara Event, the University of Waterloo Event, winning both events. At the FIRST Ontario Provincial Championship, we won our field and became Provincial Finalists.

DAVE seeks to teach students the core principles of STEAM, while giving them the opportunity to travel and compete across the world. DAVE also helps students develop their academic potential while interacting with the local community.
DAVE understands that most people have never built a robot before, therefore we welcome students from grades 8-12 and all levels of experience with open arms.
You can find more materials about Team DAVE under the Support tab, or you can click here!
